questions.question: How do I get the document ID?
questions.answer: Call `await addOnUISdk.app.document.id()` to retrieve the document ID.

questions.question: How do I get the document title?
questions.answer: Call `await addOnUISdk.app.document.title()` to retrieve the document title.

questions.question: How do I get the document link?
questions.answer: Call `await addOnUISdk.app.document.link("document")` or `link("published")` for different link types.

questions.question: How do I listen for document ID changes?
questions.answer: Use `addOnUISdk.app.on("documentIdAvailable", callback)` to listen for ID changes.

questions.question: How do I listen for title changes?
questions.answer: Use `addOnUISdk.app.on("documentTitleChange", callback)` to listen for title changes.

questions.question: What link types are available?
questions.answer: You can get "document" link or "published" link via the `link()` method parameter.
